text.value:
BULK INSERT stage1.marvel_json_raw
FROM 'data/marvel_search/@{item().name}'
WITH ( DATA_SOURCE = 'ADV_EDS')

properties.description: Connect to GitHub to extract sample files and data

scriptLines: images as (background as string, thumbnail as string),
ranking as (comicCount as integer, eventCount as integer, pageviewCount as integer, serieCount as integer, storyCount as integer),
urls as (marvel as string, wikipedia as string)

content.query:
IF EXISTS (select * from sys.external_data_sources where name = 'ADV_DATA_EDS')
	DROP EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [ADV_DATA_EDS]
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [ADV_DATA_EDS] WITH
(
	LOCATION = 'abfss://synapsedvdemo.dfs.core.windows.net/synapsedvdemo/Data/',
	TYPE = HADOOP
)

CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [ADV_JSON_DATA_EFF] 
WITH (
	FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT, 
	FORMAT_OPTIONS (
		FIELD_TERMINATOR = '0x0b', 
		USE_TYPE_DEFAULT = False
	)
)
GO

CREATE SCHEMA source
GO
CREATE SCHEMA stage1
GO
CREATE SCHEMA stage2
GO
CREATE SCHEMA vault
GO
CREATE SCHEMA mart
GO

IF EXISTS (select * from sys.external_data_sources where name = 'ADV_DATA_EDS')
	DROP EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [ADV_DATA_EDS]
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [ADV_DATA_EDS] WITH
(
	LOCATION = 'abfss://synapsedvdemo.dfs.core.windows.net/synapsedvdemo/Data/',
	TYPE = HADOOP
)

CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [EDS_SYNAPSEDVDEMO] 
WITH
(
	LOCATION = 'https://synapsedvdemo.blob.core.windows.net/synapsedvdemo/'
)

CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [EFF_CSV] WITH
(
	FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT,
    FORMAT_OPTIONS ( FIELD_TERMINATOR = ',', STRING_DELIMITER = '"', FIRST_ROW = 2   )
)

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects O JOIN sys.schemas S ON O.schema_id = S.schema_id WHERE O.NAME = 'kaggle_superhero' AND O.TYPE = 'U' AND S.NAME = 'stgL1')
CREATE TABLE stgL1.kaggle_superhero
	(
	 [name] varchar(4000),
	 [real_name] varchar(4000),
	 [full_name] varchar(4000),
	 [overall_score] varchar(4000),
	 [history_text] varchar(max),
	 [powers_text] varchar(max),
	 [intelligence_score] bigint,
	 [strength_score] bigint,
	 [speed_score] bigint,
	 [durability_score] bigint,
	 [power_score] bigint,
	 [combat_score] bigint,
	 [superpowers] varchar(4000),
	 [alter_egos] varchar(4000),
	 [aliases] varchar(4000),
	 [place_of_birth] varchar(4000),
	 [first_appearance] varchar(4000),
	 [creator] varchar(4000),
	 [alignment] varchar(4000),
	 [occupation] varchar(4000),
	 [base] varchar(4000),
	 [teams] varchar(4000),
	 [relatives] varchar(4000),
	 [gender] varchar(4000),
	 [type_race] varchar(4000),
	 [height] varchar(4000),
	 [weight] varchar(4000),
	 [eye_color] varchar(4000),
	 [hair_color] varchar(4000),
	 [skin_color] varchar(4000),
	 [img] varchar(4000),
	 [has_electrokinesis] float,
	 [has_energy_constructs] float,
	 [has_mind_control_resistance] float,
	 [has_matter_manipulation] float,
	 [has_telepathy_resistance] float,
	 [has_mind_control] float,
	 [has_enhanced_hearing] float,
	 [has_dimensional_travel] float,
	 [has_element_control] float,
	 [has_size_changing] float,
	 [has_fire_resistance] float,
	 [has_fire_control] float,
	 [has_dexterity] float,
	 [has_reality_warping] float,
	 [has_illusions] float,
	 [has_energy_beams] float,
	 [has_peak_human_condition] float,
	 [has_shapeshifting] float,
	 [has_heat_resistance] float,
	 [has_jump] float,
	 [has_self-sustenance] float,
	 [has_energy_absorption] float,
	 [has_cold_resistance] float,
	 [has_magic] float,
	 [has_telekinesis] float,
	 [has_toxin_and_disease_resistance] float,
	 [has_telepathy] float,
	 [has_regeneration] float,
	 [has_immortality] float,
	 [has_teleportation] float,
	 [has_force_fields] float,
	 [has_energy_manipulation] float,
	 [has_endurance] float,
	 [has_longevity] float,
	 [has_weapon-based_powers] float,
	 [has_energy_blasts] float,
	 [has_enhanced_senses] float,
	 [has_invulnerability] float,
	 [has_stealth] float,
	 [has_marksmanship] float,
	 [has_flight] float,
	 [has_accelerated_healing] float,
	 [has_weapons_master] float,
	 [has_intelligence] float,
	 [has_reflexes] float,
	 [has_super_speed] float,
	 [has_durability] float,
	 [has_stamina] float,
	 [has_agility] float,
	 [has_super_strength] float
	)
WITH
	(
	DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
	--  CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
	 HEAP
	)
GO

--CREATE PROC bulk_load_kaggle_superhero
--AS
--BEGIN
COPY INTO stgL1.kaggle_superhero
(name 1, real_name 2, full_name 3, overall_score 4, history_text 5, powers_text 6, intelligence_score 7, strength_score 8, 
speed_score 9, durability_score 10, power_score 11, combat_score 12, superpowers 13, alter_egos 14, aliases 15, place_of_birth 16, 
first_appearance 17, creator 18, alignment 19, occupation 20, base 21, teams 22, relatives 23, gender 24, type_race 25, height 26, 
weight 27, eye_color 28, hair_color 29, skin_color 30, img 31, has_electrokinesis 32, has_energy_constructs 33, has_mind_control_resistance 34, 
has_matter_manipulation 35, has_telepathy_resistance 36, has_mind_control 37, has_enhanced_hearing 38, has_dimensional_travel 39, 
has_element_control 40, has_size_changing 41, has_fire_resistance 42, has_fire_control 43, has_dexterity 44, has_reality_warping 45, 
has_illusions 46, has_energy_beams 47, has_peak_human_condition 48, has_shapeshifting 49, has_heat_resistance 50, has_jump 51, 
[has_self-sustenance] 52, has_energy_absorption 53, has_cold_resistance 54, has_magic 55, has_telekinesis 56, has_toxin_and_disease_resistance 57, 
has_telepathy 58, has_regeneration 59, has_immortality 60, has_teleportation 61, has_force_fields 62, has_energy_manipulation 63, has_endurance 64, 
has_longevity 65, [has_weapon-based_powers] 66, has_energy_blasts 67, has_enhanced_senses 68, has_invulnerability 69, has_stealth 70, 
has_marksmanship 71, has_flight 72, has_accelerated_healing 73, has_weapons_master 74, has_intelligence 75, has_reflexes 76, has_super_speed 77, 
has_durability 78, has_stamina 79, has_agility 80, has_super_strength 81)
FROM 'https://synapsedvdemo.dfs.core.windows.net/synapsedvdemo/Data/kaggle_superhero/superheroes_nlp_dataset.csv'
WITH
(
	FILE_TYPE = 'CSV'
	,MAXERRORS = 0
	,FIRSTROW = 2
	,ERRORFILE = 'https://synapsedvdemo.dfs.core.windows.net/synapsedvdemo/'
	,CREDENTIAL = ( IDENTITY = 'Managed Identity' )
	,ERRORFILE_CREDENTIAL = ( IDENTITY = 'Managed Identity' )
)
--END
GO

SELECT TOP 100 * FROM stgL1.kaggle_superhero
GO

CREATE OR ALTER VIEW marvel_hero AS 
SELECT 
    base_hero.filename() AS FileName,
    marvel_hero.[name], marvel_hero.superName, marvel_hero.[description],
    marvel_hero.aliases, marvel_hero.authors, marvel_hero.images,
    marvel_hero.partners, marvel_hero.powers, marvel_hero.ranking, marvel_hero.secretIdentities,
    marvel_hero.species, marvel_hero.teams, marvel_hero.urls
FROM OPENROWSET (
    BULK 'https://synapsedvdemo.blob.core.windows.net/synapsedvdemo/Data/marvel_search/**'
    ,FORMAT = 'CSV'
    ,FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b'
    ,ROWTERMINATOR = '0X0b'
    ,FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b'
) WITH (doc NVARCHAR(MAX)) AS base_hero
    CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(doc)
        WITH (
            aliases NVARCHAR(MAX) '$.aliases' AS JSON,
            authors NVARCHAR(MAX) '$.authors' AS JSON,
            description VARCHAR(256),
            images NVARCHAR(MAX) '$.images' AS JSON,
            name VARCHAR(256),
            partners NVARCHAR(MAX) '$.partners' AS JSON,
            powers NVARCHAR(MAX) '$.powers' AS JSON,
            ranking NVARCHAR(MAX) '$.ranking' AS JSON,
            secretIdentities NVARCHAR(MAX) '$.secretIdentities' AS JSON,
            species NVARCHAR(MAX) '$.species' AS JSON,
            superName VARCHAR(256),
            teams NVARCHAR(MAX) '$.teams' AS JSON,
            urls NVARCHAR(MAX) '$.urls' AS JSON
        ) AS marvel_hero 
/*         CROSS APPLY OPENJSON( marvel_marvel_hero.aliases )
            WITH (
                value VARCHAR(256) '$'		
            ) AS marvel_hero_aliases
        CROSS APPLY OPENJSON ( marvel_marvel_hero.authors )
            WITH (
                value VARCHAR(256) '$'		
            ) AS marvel_hero_authors
        CROSS APPLY OPENJSON ( marvel_marvel_hero.partners )
            WITH (
                value VARCHAR(256) '$'		
            ) AS marvel_hero_partners
        CROSS APPLY OPENJSON ( marvel_marvel_hero.powers )
            WITH (
                value VARCHAR(256) '$'		
            ) AS marvel_hero_powers
        CROSS APPLY OPENJSON ( marvel_marvel_hero.secretIdentities )
            WITH (
                value VARCHAR(256) '$'		
            ) AS marvel_hero_secretIdentities
        CROSS APPLY OPENJSON ( marvel_marvel_hero.species )
            WITH (
                value VARCHAR(100) '$'		
            ) AS marvel_hero_species
        CROSS APPLY OPENJSON ( marvel_marvel_hero.teams )
            WITH (
                value VARCHAR(256) '$'		
            ) AS marvel_hero_teams */

SELECT 
    hero.filename() AS FileName,
    marvel_hero.[name], marvel_hero.superName, marvel_hero.[description]
FROM OPENROWSET (
    BULK 'https://synapsedvdemo.blob.core.windows.net/synapsedvdemo/Data/marvel_search/**'
    ,FORMAT = 'CSV'
    ,FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b'
    ,ROWTERMINATOR = '0X0b'
    ,FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b'
) WITH (doc NVARCHAR(MAX)) AS hero
    CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(doc)
        WITH (
            aliases NVARCHAR(MAX) '$.aliases' AS JSON,
            authors NVARCHAR(MAX) '$.authors' AS JSON,
            description VARCHAR(256) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8,
            images_thumbnail VARCHAR(256) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8 '$.images.thumbnail',
            name VARCHAR(256) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8,
            partners NVARCHAR(MAX) '$.partners' AS JSON,
            powers NVARCHAR(MAX) '$.powers' AS JSON,
            ranking_comicCount BIGINT '$.ranking.comicCount',
            ranking_eventCount BIGINT '$.ranking.eventCount',
            ranking_pageviewCount BIGINT '$.ranking.pageviewCount',
            ranking_serieCount BIGINT '$.ranking.serieCount',
            ranking_storyCount BIGINT '$.ranking.storyCount',
            secretIdentities NVARCHAR(MAX) '$.secretIdentities' AS JSON,
            species NVARCHAR(MAX) '$.species' AS JSON,
            superName VARCHAR(256) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8,
            teams NVARCHAR(MAX) '$.teams' AS JSON,
            urls_wikipedia VARCHAR(256) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8 '$.urls.wikipedia'
        ) AS marvel_hero 
/*         CROSS APPLY OPENJSON( marvel_hero.aliases )
            WITH (
                value VARCHAR(256) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8 '$'		
            ) AS marvel_hero_aliases
        CROSS APPLY OPENJSON ( marvel_hero.authors )
            WITH (
                value VARCHAR(256) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8 '$'		
            ) AS marvel_hero_authors
        CROSS APPLY OPENJSON ( marvel_hero.partners )
            WITH (
                value VARCHAR(256) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8 '$'		
            ) AS marvel_hero_partners
        CROSS APPLY OPENJSON ( marvel_hero.powers )
            WITH (
                value VARCHAR(256) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8 '$'		
            ) AS marvel_hero_powers
        CROSS APPLY OPENJSON ( marvel_hero.secretIdentities )
            WITH (
                value VARCHAR(256) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8 '$'		
            ) AS marvel_hero_secretIdentities
        CROSS APPLY OPENJSON ( marvel_hero.species )
            WITH (
                value VARCHAR(100) '$'		
            ) AS marvel_hero_species
        CROSS APPLY OPENJSON ( marvel_hero.teams )
            WITH (
                value VARCHAR(256) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8 '$'		
            ) AS marvel_hero_teams */

CREATE TABLE [GeoLocation] (
  [Id] int PRIMARY KEY IDENTITY(1, 1),
  [Name] varchar(60) UNIQUE NOT NULL,
  [CreateDate] datetime DEFAULT (GETDATE())
)
GO

CREATE TABLE [SourceType] (
  [Id] int PRIMARY KEY IDENTITY(1, 1),
  [Name] varchar(60) UNIQUE NOT NULL,
  [CreateDate] datetime DEFAULT (GETDATE())
)
GO

CREATE TABLE [Organization] (
  [Id] int PRIMARY KEY IDENTITY(1, 1),
  [Name] varchar(60) UNIQUE NOT NULL,
  [CreateDate] datetime DEFAULT (GETDATE())
)
GO

CREATE TABLE [RecordSource] (
  [Id] int PRIMARY KEY IDENTITY(1, 1),
  [GeoLocationId] int NOT NULL,
  [OrganizationId] int NOT NULL,
  [Name] varchar(60) NOT NULL,
  [SourceTypeId] int NOT NULL,
  [CreateDate] datetime DEFAULT (GETDATE())
)
GO

CREATE TABLE [DataVaultTableType] (
  [Id] int PRIMARY KEY IDENTITY(1, 1),
  [Name] varchar(60) UNIQUE NOT NULL,
  [AppendKey] varchar(10) UNIQUE NOT NULL,
  [AppendKeyRule] nvarchar(255) NOT NULL CHECK ([AppendKeyRule] IN ('PREFIX', 'SUFFIX', 'AS_SCHEMA'))
)
GO

CREATE TABLE [SourceTable] (
  [Id] int PRIMARY KEY IDENTITY(1, 1),
  [TableSchema] varchar(255) NOT NULL,
  [TableName] varchar(255) NOT NULL,
  [RecordSourceId] int NOT NULL
)
GO

CREATE TABLE [SourceTableVersion] (
  [Id] int PRIMARY KEY IDENTITY(1, 1),
  [Major] int NOT NULL,
  [Minor] int NOT NULL,
  [Release] int NOT NULL,
  [SourceTableId] int NOT NULL
)
GO

CREATE TABLE [SourceColumn] (
  [Id] int PRIMARY KEY IDENTITY(1, 1),
  [SourceTableVersionId] int,
  [ColumnName] varchar(255),
  [DataType] varchar(255),
  [CharacterMaxLength] int,
  [DateNumPrecision] int,
  [IsNullable] nvarchar(255) NOT NULL CHECK ([IsNullable] IN ('NO', 'YES')),
  [OrdinalPosition] int NOT NULL,
  [IsBusinessKey] bit NOT NULL,
  [IsAttribute] bit NOT NULL,
  [IsPrimaryKey] bit NOT NULL,
  [IsForeignKey] bit NOT NULL
)
GO

CREATE TABLE [RawVaultTable] (
  [Id] int PRIMARY KEY IDENTITY(1, 1),
  [DataVaultTableTypeId] int NOT NULL,
  [Name] varchar(255) NOT NULL,
  [CreateDate] datetime NOT NULL
)
GO

CREATE TABLE [RawVaultTableVersion] (
  [Id] int PRIMARY KEY IDENTITY(1, 1),
  [Major] int NOT NULL,
  [Minor] int NOT NULL,
  [Release] int NOT NULL,
  [RawVaultTableId] int NOT NULL
)
GO

CREATE TABLE [TableMap] (
  [Id] int PRIMARY KEY IDENTITY(1, 1),
  [SourceTableVersionId] int NOT NULL,
  [RawVaultTableVersionId] int NOT NULL,
  [StagingTableVersionId] int NOT NULL,
  [WhereFilter] nvarchar(255),
  [LastModDateField] varchar(100),
  [PullData] bit DEFAULT (1),
  [TargetDirectory] nvarchar(255)
)
GO

CREATE TABLE [DataTypeMap] (
  [Id] int PRIMARY KEY IDENTITY(1, 1),
  [SourceTypeId] int NOT NULL,
  [SourceDataType] varchar(255) NOT NULL,
  [TargetDataType] varchar(255) NOT NULL
)
GO

ALTER TABLE [RecordSource] ADD FOREIGN KEY ([GeoLocationId]) REFERENCES [GeoLocation] ([Id])
GO

ALTER TABLE [RecordSource] ADD FOREIGN KEY ([OrganizationId]) REFERENCES [Organization] ([Id])
GO

ALTER TABLE [RecordSource] ADD FOREIGN KEY ([SourceTypeId]) REFERENCES [SourceType] ([Id])
GO

ALTER TABLE [SourceTable] ADD FOREIGN KEY ([RecordSourceId]) REFERENCES [RecordSource] ([Id])
GO

ALTER TABLE [SourceTableVersion] ADD FOREIGN KEY ([SourceTableId]) REFERENCES [SourceTable] ([Id])
GO

ALTER TABLE [SourceColumn] ADD FOREIGN KEY ([SourceTableVersionId]) REFERENCES [SourceTableVersion] ([Id])
GO

ALTER TABLE [RawVaultTable] ADD FOREIGN KEY ([DataVaultTableTypeId]) REFERENCES [DataVaultTableType] ([Id])
GO

ALTER TABLE [RawVaultTableVersion] ADD FOREIGN KEY ([RawVaultTableId]) REFERENCES [RawVaultTable] ([Id])
GO

ALTER TABLE [TableMap] ADD FOREIGN KEY ([SourceTableVersionId]) REFERENCES [SourceTableVersion] ([Id])
GO

ALTER TABLE [TableMap] ADD FOREIGN KEY ([RawVaultTableVersionId]) REFERENCES [RawVaultTableVersion] ([Id])
GO

ALTER TABLE [DataTypeMap] ADD FOREIGN KEY ([SourceTypeId]) REFERENCES [SourceType] ([Id])
GO

CREATE UNIQUE INDEX [RecordSource_index_0] ON [RecordSource] ("GeoLocationId", "OrganizationId", "Name")
GO

CREATE UNIQUE INDEX [SourceTable_index_1] ON [SourceTable] ("TableSchema", "TableName")
GO

CREATE UNIQUE INDEX [SourceTableVersion_index_2] ON [SourceTableVersion] ("Major", "Minor", "Release", "SourceTableId")
GO

CREATE UNIQUE INDEX [SourceColumn_index_3] ON [SourceColumn] ("SourceTableVersionId", "ColumnName")
GO

CREATE UNIQUE INDEX [RawVaultTableVersion_index_4] ON [RawVaultTableVersion] ("Major", "Minor", "Release", "RawVaultTableId")
GO

CREATE UNIQUE INDEX [TableMap_index_5] ON [TableMap] ("SourceTableVersionId", "RawVaultTableVersionId")
GO

CREATE UNIQUE INDEX [DataTypeMap_index_6] ON [DataTypeMap] ("SourceTypeId", "SourceDataType")
GO

DROP EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [ADV_DATA_EDS]
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [ADV_DATA_EDS] WITH 
(	TYPE = BLOB_STORAGE,
	LOCATION = N'abfss://synapsedvdemo.dfs.core.windows.net/synapsedvdemo/Data'
);
GO

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT TOP 100
    jsonContent
    , JSON_QUERY (jsonContent, '$.aliases') AS aliases
/* --> place the keys that you see in JSON documents in the WITH clause:
       , JSON_VALUE (jsonContent, '$.key1') ASheader1
       , JSON_VALUE (jsonContent, '$.key2')ASheader2
*/
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://synapsedvdemo.dfs.core.windows.net/synapsedvdemo/Data/marvel_search/Abner_Jenkins.json',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
        FIELDTERMINATOR ='0x0b',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0b'
    )
    WITH (
        jsonContent varchar(MAX)
    ) AS [result]
